author: USA TODAY
title: Justin Tucker absolutely annihilated 75-yard kick
text:
Justin Tucker absolutely annihilated 75-yard kick Whoa. Justin Tucker absolutely annihilated 75-yard kick Whoa.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/nfl-pro-bowl-baltimore-ravens-justin-tucker-75-yard-field-goal-kick-practice-video/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Justin Tucker absolutely annihilated 75-yard kick Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 3:34 p.m. ET Jan. 25, 2017 
Dec 16, 2013; Detroit, MI, USA; Baltimore Ravens kicker Justin Tucker (9) celebrates after kicking a 61 yard field goal during the fourth quarter against the Detroit Lions at Ford Field. Baltimore Ravens defeated the Detroit Lions 18-16. (Photo: Andrew Weber-USA TODAY Sports) 
Baltimore Ravens kicker Justin Tucker has a leg of steel and proved it in Pro Bowl practice on Wednesday. 
Check this out: He booted a ball 75 yards through the uprights: From 75 in sunny Orlando! Shoutout to #RavensFlock !! pic.twitter.com/QYaxVw7FML â€” Justin Tucker (@jtuck9) January 25, 2017 
It's crazy how that thing takes off like it was shot out of a cannon. 
Here's the biggest takeaway: Tucker has claimed he would try an 84.5-yard attempt if the conditions were right , which was challenged by Denver Broncos kicker Brandon McManus . Now, Tucker kicked this one in from 75, and you figure the altitude in Denver might add a few more yards. So maybe he'd be pretty close to hitting from 80 yards in Mile High in practice?
